\tilde{s}_{q}(k,m)=q^{k(k-1)/2}\;s_{q}(k,m)\qquad\qquad\qquad\tilde{S}_{q}(m,k% )=q^{-k(k-1)/2}\;S_{q}(m,k)\;.

a\;|l>=\sqrt{[l]}\;|l-1>\qquad a^{\dagger}\;|l>=\sqrt{[l+1]}\;|l+1>\qquad\hat{% n}\;|l>=l\;|l>\;.

[a,a^{\dagger}]_{Q}=aa^{\dagger}-Qa^{\dagger}a=\phi(\hat{n})=\frac{1}{q-p}\Big% {(}q^{\hat{n}}(q-Q)+p^{\hat{n}}(Q-p)\Big{)}\;.
